[

{title, "Rounded Panel Element"},

{see_also, [base, panel, span]},

{usage, "
#rounded_panel { color=white, body=[
	#h3 { text=\"Title\" },
	\"This is a rounded panel.\"
]}
"},

{description, "The rounded panel element produces a Web 2.0 style rounded panel on the page."},

{attributes, [

	{"body", "Nitrogen element or list of elements.", "Set the element or elements that will be rendered within this panel."},
	
	{"color", "An atom, either 'white', 'black', or 'gray'", "Set the background color of the panel."}
	
]}

].
